title: Marcel Fafchamps: Mobilizing P2P Diffusion for New Agricultural Practices

tasks.task: Host seminar on agricultural technology diffusion and teacher training.
subtasks: Introduce co-authors and outline paper's objective on SRI technology diffusion.
Explain systems of rice intensification (SRI) benefits and challenges.
Describe experimental design, including village selection, assignment rules, and treatments.
Detail teacher trainee selection and incentivization methods.
Address weighting and stratified sampling considerations for analysis.
Discuss average treatment effects on SRI adoption and agricultural performance.
Analyze quiz scores and knowledge transmission between teachers and students.
Compare adoption rates between incentivized and non-incentivized teachers.
Examine influence of nominated vs. randomly assigned students on adoption.
Interpret results and discuss social return on intervention.
